definitions.text: a sudden rapid flow (as of water)
examples: he heard the flush of a toilet
there was a little gush of blood
she attacked him with an outpouring of words

definitions.text: gush forth in a sudden stream or jet

examples: She raved about that new restaurant

definitions.text: issue in a jet; come out in a jet; stream or spring forth
examples: flames were jetting out of the building
